markdown.markdown:
I am interested in the use of long-term monitoring methods towards coastal and terrestrial ecosystems, and spatial-temporal questions. I am experienced with various statistical and geospatial software. I am looking to apply my skills with ecological data and remote sensing to scientific outreach projects!\
\
I have conducted research across different fields and systems, studying marine ecology along the Monterey Peninsula and terrestrial plant phenology across the contiguous U.S. I have ventured from the western rocky intertidals to the bogs in the North East.

## Education

**January 2023 - December 2025** \| M.S. Ecology and Environmental Science \| University of Maine, Orono \| [record lab](https://sites.google.com/maine.edu/record-lab){target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

**August 2017 - May 2022** \| B.S. in Marine Science, minor in Statistics \| California State University of Monterey Bay (CSUMB)

## Research Experience

**January 2023 - December 2025** \| Graduate Research Assistant \| University of Maine

**June 2022 - December 2022** \| Intern-Researcher \| NSF Geo Bridge Program \| CSUMB 

## Teaching & Mentorship 

**Summer 2025** \| NSF-REU Mentor \| University of Maine

**January 2023 - December 2024** \| Teaching Assistant \| Department of Wildlife, Fisheries, and Conservation Biology

## Community Engagement and Service Experience

**Spring 2025** \| Tabling and guided activity \| Meet a Scientist Event \| Hirundo Wildlife Refuge, Maine

**Spring 2024 - Spring 2025** \| Event Coordinator \| DEI Leadership Committee (Dept. Wildlife, Fisheries, and Conservation Biology) \| University of Maine

**Summer 2023** \| Invited Webinar Speaker \| [2023 NBPS SRC/Sigma Xi Research Webinar, South Florida](https://youtu.be/ZkCoa0eO6cM?si=05NLHE9zMw4R3VqD&t=162){target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

**Spring 2022** \| Presenter and Activity Guide \| Library Makerspace Workshop Series \| CSUMB

## Career Interests

I am interested in the use of long-term monitoring methods towards coastal and terrestrial ecosystems, and spatial-temporal questions. I am experienced with various statistical and geospatial software. I am looking to apply my skills with ecological data and remote sensing to scientific outreach projects!\
\
I have conducted research across different fields and systems, studying marine ecology along the Monterey Peninsula and terrestrial plant phenology across the contiguous U.S. I have ventured from the western rocky intertidals to the bogs in the North East.

## Education

**January 2023 - December 2025** \| M.S. Ecology and Environmental Science \| University of Maine, Orono \| [record lab](https://sites.google.com/maine.edu/record-lab){target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

**August 2017 - May 2022** \| B.S. in Marine Science, minor in Statistics \| California State University of Monterey Bay (CSUMB)

## Research Experience

**January 2023 - December 2025** \| Graduate Research Assistant \| University of Maine

**June 2022 - December 2022** \| Intern-Researcher \| NSF Geo Bridge Program \| CSUMB 

## Teaching & Mentorship 

**Summer 2025** \| NSF-REU Mentor \| University of Maine

**January 2023 - December 2024** \| Teaching Assistant \| Department of Wildlife, Fisheries, and Conservation Biology

## Community Engagement and Service Experience

**Spring 2025** \| Tabling and guided activity \| Meet a Scientist Event \| Hirundo Wildlife Refuge, Maine

**Spring 2024 - Spring 2025** \| Event Coordinator \| DEI Leadership Committee (Dept. Wildlife, Fisheries, and Conservation Biology) \| University of Maine

**Summer 2023** \| Invited Webinar Speaker \| [2023 NBPS SRC/Sigma Xi Research Webinar, South Florida](https://youtu.be/ZkCoa0eO6cM?si=05NLHE9zMw4R3VqD&t=162){target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

**Spring 2022** \| Presenter and Activity Guide \| Library Makerspace Workshop Series \| CSUMB
